Name: Illumio Core
Author: Microsoft
Description:
The [Illumio Core](https://www.illumio.com/products/) solution allows you to ingest Illumio Core logs into Microsoft Sentinel.

1. **Illumio Core via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting Illumio Core logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**.

2. **Illumio Core via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting Illumio Core logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

**NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of Illumio Core via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate).
